@ykarvind You were accordingly informed about the restrictions via different communication platforms. For refund, as you have already connected with our teams in Canada, we will also reach out to them for a quick response to your query.

@ykarvind in transit at Charles De Gaulle for passengers to fulfil the mandatory test regulation before continuing the journey to Canada are limited and restrictive for many passengers. We strive our utmost to keep  customers informed of latest regulations in this fast changing scenario.

@ykarvind here: https://t.co/trXazEunVJ. Passengers who travel from India to Canada via an indirect route still need to provide a pre-departure negative COVID-19 molecular test result from a third country before continuing their journey to Canada.

data.text: @ckchandan1810 Thank you for reaching out to us. Kindly connect with our Customer Contact Centre, India Toll Free: 1800 4193 033 or + 91 124 623 3502 b/w 0800hrs – 2000hrs (MON-FRI), 0900hrs-1700hrs(SAT-SUN & public holidays) for rebooking your flights. Regards,
@YashSha03018371 For more info, connect with our IN Toll Free: 18004193033 or +911246233502 b/w 0800– 2000hrs (MON-FRI), 0900-1700hrs(SAT-SUN & PH).Rgds,

@YashSha03018371 Hello Yash, operations ex India are in accordance to "Air Bubble Agreement" scope and process. For info visit https://t.co/XaBfqr54N2. A general overview of entry requirements, is available https://t.co/1bJsHtVNs7.

@lokeshramani Hello Lokesh, Scope and process for flights ex. India is available https://t.co/XaBfqr54N2. For a general overview of travel conditions refer https://t.co/1bJsHtVNs7. For info. on travel docs. & visa kindly check with the embassy/consulate for final destination/transit countries.

@RAHULCHOPRA0799 @airfrance We regret the inconvenience caused to you. We have been advised that this claim was submitted in Ireland. Our colleagues are working on it and shall get back to you. Regards,

data.text: @anilsemwal16 Hello Anil, For the testing requirements & timelines prescribed by destination/transit countries kindly visit  relevant county’s website. For info. on scope and process visit https://t.co/XaBfqr54N2 or https://t.co/1bJsHtVNs7.
@Singhni_Kaur Hello, kindly share your ticket/booking reference no. with us via a direct message only for our teams to check. Regards,

@Chaudhry_Satyam Hello Satyam, we regret the inconvenience caused. Kindly call our Customer Contact Centre, India Toll Free: 1800 4193 033 or + 91 124 623 3502 b/w 0800hrs – 2000hrs (MON-FRI), 0900hrs-1700hrs(SAT-SUN & PH) for assistance with additional bag.Rgds,

@AMukherjee2612 Hello Atanu, Operations ex India are in accordance to Air Bubble Agreement. For info visit https://t.co/XaBfqr54N2. For a general overview, refer to https://t.co/EEfMPMQHTC. For further assistance, connect with our IN Toll Free: 18004193033/ +911246233502 b/w 0900-1700hrs. Rgds

@AltafKalaburgi Hello Altaf, a general overview of travel requirements can be found on https://t.co/1bJsHtVNs7. For info on travel documents & visa kindly check with the embassy/consulate for relevant countries. You may also  call at IN Toll Free: 18004193033/ +911246233502 b/w 0900-1700hrs.Rgds

@kshitijbarnwal Thank you for reaching out to us. Operations ex India are in accordance to "Air Bubble Agreement" scope and process. For info visit https://t.co/XaBfqr54N2. For info on travel documents & visa kindly check with the embassy/consulate for final destination and transit countries.
@divij_dua358 Dear Divij, we have responded to your query via DM. Regards,

@ParanKapur @airfrance @AirFranceFR Thank you for reaching out to us. We have been informed by our refunds team that refund on your ticket has been processed and a separate email confirming the timelines has been sent to you. Regards,
